sense.gloss: stripping a Diet member of arrest immunity
eve of the anniversary of a person's death

r_ele.r: こくさいたいほじょう

sense.gloss: immunity from arrest (for Diet members, foreign diplomats, etc.), parliamentary immunity, legislative immunity, diplomatic immunity

r_ele.r: たいほきょだくせいきゅう

sense.gloss: request to arrest a member of parliament while still in session
right to arrest, power of arrest

r_ele.r: たいほかんきんちしょうざい

sense.gloss: crimes of abduction, confinement and bodily injury
false arrest and imprisonment, illegal arrest and confinement

r_ele.r: たいほおよびかんきんざい

sense.gloss: false arrest and imprisonment, illegal arrest and confinement

r_ele.r: たいほかんきんちししょうざい

sense.gloss: illegal arrest and imprisonment resulting in death or bodily injury
mistaken arrest, arrest based on misidentification
techniques for arresting criminals, arrest technique
in flagrante delicto arrest, arrest of someone in the act of committing a crime
